Semrush Webinars
Learn from the best voices in SEO, content marketing, ecommerce, social media, competitive research, and more! Sharpen your digital marketing skills with our free webinars.

OCT

24

SEO
Crystal Carter
Erich Casagrande
45 minutes
SEO for New Websites: Start as an Expert
Launching a new website is exciting, but it can also feel overwhelming - especially when it comes to SEO and generating traffic. With so much to do, it’s difficult to know where to focus your efforts first. Join Erich Casagrande from Semrush and Crystal Carter, Head of SEO Communications at Wix, for a webinar where they’ll walk you through essential SEO priorities for new websites. They’ll share practical tips and strategies to help you lay a solid SEO foundation from day one and focus on what matters most. Don’t miss this chance to set your website up for long-term success!
View webinar info
Register Now
PAST
SEO
Local SEO
Andrew Shotland
Marika Ramishvili
1 hour
The Local Pack Blueprint for Top Rankings
Want to take your local business to the top of Google Maps? Join our upcoming webinar featuring Andrew Shotland, CEO and founder of Local SEO Guide. We’ll break down real-world examples and use cases, revealing strategies to increase your visibility —whether you run a single location or multiple, serve a highly competitive market, or cover an entire city or region.

We'll use Semrush Local’s Map Rank Tracker to investigate actual Google Maps data and uncover valuable insights to help you craft a winning local SEO strategy. You'll also discover how Map Rank Tracker can reveal your rankings alongside your competitors' to measure the impact of your SEO efforts and fine-tune your approach.

If you’re looking to boost your position in Google Maps or refine your strategy to get more eyes on your business, this webinar is a must!
View webinar info
Watch Now
PAST
SEO
Content Marketing
Social Media
Rita Cidre
Victoria Blinova
Nitin Manchanda
Cory Johnson
Zaria Parvez
45 minutes
Expert Roundtable: Insider Tips from Spotlight Speakers
For every marketing challenge you have, there’s a marketer out there who’s solved it. And guess what…they’re probably in this panel. Join us for a roundtable discussion with some of today’s brightest minds in marketing. Each of our esteemed guests will get 10 minutes in the spotlight to share their top marketing tips and, most importantly, answer your most burning questions.
View webinar info
Watch Now
PAST
Content Marketing
Social Media
Sales
Ashleen Narula
Rita Cidre
45 minutes
Black Friday Brilliance: Crafting Campaigns that Convert
Black Friday presents a unique opportunity to drive significant revenue for your brand. For this reason, every year, inboxes and social media feeds all over the world are flooded with discounts and promotions. In this saturated space, how do you make your brand and offer stand out? Get ready to turbocharge your Black Friday Campaigns with this free exclusive webinar where Rita Cidre, Head of Academy at Semrush and Ashleen Narula, Founder of Grad Girl Marketing, come together to help you master the art of creating high-converting Black Friday campaigns.
View webinar info
Watch Now
PAST
SEO
Aleyda Solis
30 minutes
Global SEO Playbook
In the world of international SEO, Aleyda Solis is in a league of her own. She’s an author, speaker and consultant with over 15 years of experience helping brands such as Spotify, Les Roches and Freshbooks grow their global footprint. And in this exclusive webinar and Q&A, she will share her playbook with you.

Join her for an exclusive insider’s look into the strategies that have helped her and her clients drive business growth through relevant and localized web experiences.
View webinar info
Watch Now
PAST
SEO
Local SEO
AI
Marika Ramishvili
Dani Owens
1 hour
Website Content and Structure for Local SEO
In this expert-led webinar, we explore how changes to your website content and structure can boost your local search rankings. Whether you're a small business owner, a franchise manager, or part of an agency, this session is packed with expert strategies to help you stand out online and attract more local customers. To give you even more practical, hands-on knowledge, we also share tips to craft optimized content that increases foot traffic to your business. Don't miss our live demonstration of the Semrush Local and ContentShake AI tools too, designed to streamline and enhance your local SEO.
View webinar info
